chess

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class
    Author:
    Amy Guinto, Aziz Rahman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Board constructor Initializes a 2D array representing the board to null

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPiece(chess.Piece piece)
      addPiece adds a specified piece to the board
      void display()
      display prints out the board and its pieces
      void fill()
      fill creates all of the starting pieces and places them in their appropriate spots on the board
      void fillList()
      fillList creates a 2D array called list representing all of the pieces Each starting piece is placed in an index in the array
      chess.Piece getPiece(int row, int col)
      getPiece returns the piece at a specified location
      void movePiece(chess.Piece piece, int row, int col)
      movePiece moves a given piece to a specified location
      void removePiece(int row, int col)
      removePiece removes the piece at a specified location

        public void fillList()
        fillList creates a 2D array called list representing all of the pieces Each starting piece is placed in an index in the array

      • fill

        public void fill()
        fill creates all of the starting pieces and places them in their appropriate spots on the board

      • getPiece

        public chess.Piece getPiece(int row,
                            int col)
        getPiece returns the piece at a specified location
        Parameters:
        row - indicates the rank of the piece
        col - indicates the file of the piece
        Returns:
        Piece

      • addPiece

        public void addPiece(chess.Piece piece)
        addPiece adds a specified piece to the board
        Parameters:

      • removePiece

        public void removePiece(int row,
                        int col)
        removePiece removes the piece at a specified location
        Parameters:
        row - indicates the rank of the piece to be removed
        col - indicates the file of the piece to be removed

      • movePiece

        public void movePiece(chess.Piece piece,
                      int row,
                      int col)
        movePiece moves a given piece to a specified location
        Parameters:
        piece - is the piece to be moved
        row - indicates the rank the piece is to be moved to
        col - indicates the file the piece is to be moved to

        public void display()
        display prints out the board and its pieces
